attributes.action: LAWFULLY STOP THE BURNING OF FLAGS, HOLY BOOKS OR REMEMBRANCE SYMBOLS
attributes.additional_details: England has recently seen the burning of our Union Jack flag and Remembrance Day Poppy. We see this as an insult as these items are special to us and our history. These people are performing these appauling acts under the very freedom that our solders fought and died for. This insulting act of burning or damaging any Nation's precious flag, holy book or symbols must be made illegal.
